sub_title: Executive Office Operations | HR | Office Management | Administration | Relationship Management | Over 11 Years
summary:
Arina Zhurova has acquired extensive multicultural and cross functional experience in facilitating executive administration to Top Level professionals and holds fluency in multiple languages, including English, Russian and Arabic. She is a detail focused, prolific relationship builder with experience in Administration and Education sector across creating an operating schedule for the Top Level Executives, setting up meetings, handling PR, receiving VIP guests, coordinating business meetings and organizing private flights around the world for Executives by searching aircraft, slots and payments. Possess valuable insight, keen analysis and team approach to implement best practices used in organizing and leading secretarial and administrative activities.

Arina Zhurova is a high integrity, energetic, self-driven and motivated professional with immense zeal & enthusiasm to accept and meet challenges in a competitive environment, while delivering required results within the allotted time frame. Demonstrated skills in relationship management coupled with expertise in handling confidential information to top management. Skilled in structuring and implementing innovative administrative policies/procedures to generate undivided commitment as well as dedication among the team. Instrumental in utilizing appropriate methods and a flexible interpersonal style to set up an office and ensure the effective and efficient flow of work throughout the office.

Some of his notable functional strengths:

â˜… Arina is stellar in receiving excellent ratings in all the appraisals and hold credentials in managing & executing the shifting of employees from the Moscow office to Dubai by coordinating & managing 300 employees within a time frame of 4 months.
